item.title: From Hours to Minutes: Lossless Acceleration of Ultra Long Sequence Generation up to 100K Tokens
item.description: TokenSwift: Accelerate LLM ultra-long sequence generation up to 100K tokens with >3x speedup and lossless accuracy!
